descriptions: This reminds me of the reverberation of like a snare drum. There is a feeling that builds and even when the drummer stops the sound continues until whatever inside that snare drum stops shaking. However, I would decribe this a an attenuated snare drum, because when the vibration slows it is really quite muted.
